title: Chapter 1: Course Introduction and Overview of Machine Learning
description: An introductory chapter covering the basics of machine learning, the significance of data and its relationship with artificial intelligence.

title: Chapter 2: Data Types and Sources
description: Exploration of the different types of data relevant to machine learning, including structured and unstructured data sources.

title: Chapter 3: Data Preprocessing Techniques
description: Techniques for cleaning data, handling missing values, and normalizing datasets in preparation for machine learning.

title: Chapter 4: Introduction to AI and Relevance of Data Quality
description: An overview of supervised learning, its key algorithms, and the importance of high-quality data in AI applications.

title: Chapter 5: Classification Algorithms
description: Introduction to common classification algorithms, specifically Decision Trees and k-nearest Neighbors.

title: Chapter 6: Regression Techniques
description: Discussion on regression methods including Linear Regression and Logistic Regression and their applications.

title: Chapter 7: Ensemble Methods
description: Exploration of ensemble techniques such as Random Forests and Boosting, focusing on improving model accuracy.

title: Chapter 8: Evaluation Metrics for Machine Learning Models
description: Introduction to various evaluation metrics used to assess machine learning models, including Accuracy, Precision, Recall, and F1 Score.

title: Chapter 10: Data-Centric AI Approaches
description: Overview of data-centric approaches in AI, exploring their applications and importance in model success.

title: Chapter 11: Clustering Methods
description: Introduction to clustering techniques, focusing on k-means clustering and hierarchical clustering methods.

title: Chapter 12: Dimensionality Reduction Techniques
description: Exploration of techniques for reducing the dimensionality of datasets, including PCA and t-SNE.

title: Chapter 13: Introduction to Neural Networks and Deep Learning
description: Fundamentals of neural networks and an introduction to deep learning concepts.

title: Chapter 14: Current Trends in AI and the Importance of Data
description: Discussion of current AI trends and the significance of data quality in various industrial applications.

title: Chapter 15: Final Project Work and Guidance
description: Focus on developing the final group project with guidance and feedback sessions.

title: Chapter 16: Final Project Presentations
description: Presentation of final projects, showcasing the application of machine learning concepts learned throughout the course.
